name: commander
description: A Norton Commander clone based on Web Components and C# (.NET 5) ## Prerequisites on Linux (Fedora) * ```sudo dnf install gtk3-devel``` * ```sudo dnf install libsoup-devel``` * ```sudo dnf install webkit2gtk3-devel.x86_64``` * ```sudo dnf install libudev-devel``` ## Prerequisites on KDE * ```sudo apt install build-essential``` * ```sudo apt-get install libgtk-3-dev``` * ```sudo apt install libsoup2.4-dev``` * ```sudo apt-get install libwebkit2gtk-4.0-dev```
author: Uwe Riegel
